welcome.title: Welcome to Tatami
welcome.message: Your timeline is empty! Do you need help to learn how to use Tatami? Please click on the button below to launch a presentation.

help.title: Help
help.line2: Follow the next steps for a tour of the main Tatami features.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.line1: This is your timeline. It displays all messages
timeline.bulletPoint1: mentioning you or sent privately to you
timeline.bulletPoint4: sent to group you are subscribed to
timeline.afterBP1: If it's empty, don't worry, it will get updated as soon as you start following other users!
timeline.afterBP2: When viewing a message, you can reply to it and mark it as a favorite to find it easily later.
timeline.afterBP3: If a message already has some replies, you can see them all by clicking on the timestamp or clicking 'View Conversation'.

post.title: Posting Messages
post.line1: Here is where you write messages you want to share
post.bulletPoint1: All messages are public by default. They will be delivered to all users who follow you.
post.bulletPoint2: When writing a message you should use #hashtags. This simply means adding a # at the beginning of important words that can be used to find your message.
post.bulletPoint3: When mentioning or replying to other users you should add a @ at the beginning of their name. They will be notified that you are talking to them.

groups.title: Groups
groups.line1: This is the list of groups you are a member of.
groups.line2: You can find and subscribe to public groups in the Account/Groups page (top-right menu).
groups.line3: There are also private groups. You cannot subscribe to these. The owner of the group must add you as a member.

trends.title: Trends
trends.line1: This list represents the #hashtags that are currently the most often used on Tatami. Use this to discover what's going on and what are the hottest topics on Tatami!

whoToFollow.title: Who To Follow
whoToFollow.line1: This is a list of users who share common interests with you and who you could follow.
whoToFollow.line2: If you are a new user, this list is probably empty. Tatami needs some time to learn who you are in order to suggest relevant users.
whoToFollow.line3: And don't forget to use #hashtags in your messages. It makes everything easier!

global.title: TatamiJHipster
global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

menu.jhipster-needle-menu-add-element: JHipster will add additional menu entries here (do not translate!)

entities.jhipster-needle-menu-add-entry: JHipster will add additional entities here (do not translate!)

info.authenticated:
If you want to sign in, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 5 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 5 characters.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters.

validation.minlength: This field is required to be at least {{min}} characters.
validation.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than {{max}} characters.
validation.min: This field should be more than {{min}}.
validation.max: This field cannot be more than {{max}}.
validation.minbytes: This field should be more than {{min}} bytes.
validation.maxbytes: This field cannot be more than {{max}} bytes.
validation.number: This field should be a number.
validation.datetimelocal: This field should be a date and time.

error.Size: Field {{fieldName}} does not meet min/max size requirements!
error.domainbad: The chosen domain does not match the current user.
error.deleteself: You cannot delete your own account
error.idexists: A new {{entityName}} cannot already have an ID
